[[File:Windows 7.png|Windows 7|thumb|300px|[[Windows 7]] also uses aero]]
'''Windows Aero''' is the [[graphical user interface]] and the default [[theme (computing)|theme]] in most editions of [[Windows Vista]], an [[operating system]] released by [[Microsoft]] on 31 January 2007. It is also available in [[Windows Server 2008]], which was released on [[February 27]], [[2008]] and is part of [[Windows 7]]. Its name is a [[backronym]] for ''Authentic, Energetic, Reflective and Open''.<ref>{{cite web
'''Windows Aero''' is the [[graphical user interface]] and the default [[theme (computing)|theme]] in most editions of [[Windows Vista]], an [[operating system]] released by [[Microsoft]] on 31 January 2007. It is also available in [[Windows Server 2008]], which was released on [[February 27]], [[2008]] and is part of [[Windows 7]].
